name: Intel GDS Mitigation
description: CPU Microcode must be updated to mitigate against an information-disclosure security issue called Gather Data Sampling.
failure-impact: Firmware without this feature enabled allow an attacker to exfiltrate secrets by running a malicious program or script.

failure-results.not-valid: microcode is not new enough to support required mitigations

success-results.enabled: microcode mitigation is supported, enabled and locked
